item.title: Rated "Umweg nach Hause" 7/10

item.title: Rated "Black Panther" 9/10
item.description: T'Challa, the King of Wakanda, rises to the throne in the isolated, technologically advanced African nation, but his claim is challenged by a vengeful outsider who was a childhood victim of T'Challa's father's mistake.

item.description: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

item.description: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers.

item.description: James is 17 and is pretty sure he is a psychopath. Alyssa, also 17, is the cool and moody new girl at school. The pair make a connection and she persuades him to embark on a road trip in search of her real father.

item.description: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

item.description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

item.description: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

item.description: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

item.description: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

item.description: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

item.description: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

item.title: Rated "WEIT. Die Geschichte von einem Weg um die Welt" 9/10

item.title: Rated "Baby Driver" 9/10
item.description: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

item.title: Rated "Total Recall" 4/10
item.description: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Recall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

item.title: Rated "The Kids Are All Right" 5/10
item.description: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.

item.description: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.

item.title: Rated "Sing" 9/10
item.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists' find that their lives will never be the same.

item.title: Rated "Dream, Girl" 9/10
item.description: Dream, Girl is a documentary showcasing the stories of inspiring and ambitious female entrepreneurs. Let's stop telling girls they can be anything they want to be and show them what it means to be a leader.

item.title: Rated "Ame & Yuki - Die Wolfskinder" 8/10
item.description: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident, a woman must find a way to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him. But their inheritance of their father's traits proved to be a challenge for her.

item.title: Rated "Embrace" 7/10

item.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

item.title: Rated "Pets" 6/10

item.title: Rated "I Am Not Your Negro" 8/10

item.title: Rated "Vaiana - Das Paradies hat einen Haken" 8/10

item.title: Rated "Best Exotic Marigold Hotel" 8/10
item.description: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

item.title: Rated "Kubo: Der tapfere Samurai" 7/10

item.title: Rated "Fremd in der Welt" 8/10

item.title: Rated "Einfach zu haben" 8/10
item.description: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

item.title: Rated "La La Land" 9/10

item.description: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

item.description: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

item.title: Rated "Logan: The Wolverine" 8/10

item.description: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

item.description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

item.title: Rated "Black Sheep" 7/10

item.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

item.title: Rated "The Man from Earth" 8/10

item.title: Rated "Tatsächlich... Liebe" 8/10

item.description: Life for the residents of a tower block begins to run out of control.

item.description: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.

item.title: Rated "Arrival" 10/10

item.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

item.description: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

item.title: Rated "Tallulah" 9/10

item.title: Rated "Snow Cake" 7/10
item.description: A drama focused on the friendship between a high-functioning autistic woman and a man who is traumatized after a fatal car accident.

item.title: Rated "10 Cloverfield Lane" 8/10
item.description: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

item.title: Rated "Die Melodie des Meeres" 8/10
item.description: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

item.description: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

item.title: Rated "Zoomania" 8/10
item.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

item.title: Rated "Big Eyes" 6/10

item.description: Lyndon Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act.

item.title: Rated "Leben und Sterben in God's Pocket" 4/10
item.description: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.
